lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : 2KM/卿溪
[00:01.000] 作曲 : 卿溪/2KM
[00:02.000] 编曲 : 橘子海 (Orange Ocean)
[00:03.000] 制作人 : 橘子海 (Orange Ocean)
[00:19.079]Whatever you do
[00:20.784]Whatever you say
[00:22.780]Like a trumpet in my head
[00:26.381]Could be a dream
[00:28.196]Could be a film
[00:30.343]Scratches on my nose…
[00:33.702]Leave me alone
[00:35.435]Lead me astray
[00:37.985]Stitches on my chest
[00:40.951]I won't fall in love
[00:44.328]…I won't fall in love？
[01:02.682]You know I know
[01:04.688]Oh my buddy
[01:06.700]I'm sleeping on the moon
[01:09.929]I was falling down
[01:12.247]Had no courage
[01:13.931]“How splendid”
[01:15.405]It's what I've done
[01:17.996]To carry it
[01:19.793]And bury it
[01:20.945]I've really lost control
[01:24.690]I just fell in love
[01:27.852]It's now or never ever
[03:42.720][03:13.589][02:44.528][01:31.869]How to replace the stars with these diamonds
[03:49.872][03:20.797][02:51.712][01:38.954]How to relive one kiss,restart everything
[03:57.184][03:27.988][02:58.940][01:46.222]How to fill up your heart if I'm nothing to you
[04:04.479][03:35.453][03:06.363][01:53.542]How to confess your love
[04:05.907] 管乐编曲 : 橘子海 (Orange Ocean)/Gustav Yu
[04:07.335] 录音师 : 卿溪/雅琳
[04:08.763] 录音棚 : 陋室音乐L.O.W Studio
[04:10.191] 混音师 : 李天衣
[04:11.619] 吉他 : 2KM
[04:13.047] 贝斯 : 小路
[04:14.475] 鼓 : 卿溪
[04:15.903] 键盘 : 卿溪
[04:17.331] 和声 : 橘子海 (Orange Ocean)/雅琳
[04:18.759] 小号 : 孙延照
[04:20.187] 圆号 : 张轩
[04:21.615] 母带后期 : John Davis@Metropolis Studios
